articles.description: Did Steve Borthwick produce his best win as England coach? Can Italy now avoid the Wooden Spoon? Is Le Garrec what France were missing?
articles.title: Six Nations talking points from round four

articles.description: After Liverpool's pulsating draw with Premier League title rivals Manchester City, Phil McNulty discusses five major talking points from the match.
articles.title: The hype is real - five reflections on Liverpool v Man City

articles.description: Questions are being asked of England at the mid-point of the Ben Stokes-Brendon McCullum era, and now they must evolve to achieve the perfect finale, says Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: 'Not the beginning of the end, but the end of the beginning'

articles.description: Serie A club Lecce sack manager Roberto D'Aversa after he headbutted Verona striker Thomas Henry following Sunday's 1-0 loss.
articles.title: Lecce sack manager D'Aversa for headbutting Henry

articles.description: Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp was bemused by the decision not to award his side a late penalty in the 1-1 Premier League draw with Manchester City.
articles.title: 'What must you have for lunch if you think that's not a penalty?'

articles.description: Sydney Roosters prop Spencer Leniu is suspended for eight weeks by the NRL for racially abusing Ezra Mam.
articles.title: Spencer Leniu: Sydney Roosters prop banned for eight weeks for racially abusing Ezra Mam

articles.description: Emily Scarratt and Zoe Harrison return from long-term injuries to make England Women's Six Nations squad.
articles.title: England recall Scarratt & Harrison for Six Nations

articles.description: World number one Iga Swiatek overcomes a slow start to beat Czech teenager Linda Noskova 6-4 6-0 and reach the fourth round at Indian Wells.
articles.title: Indian Wells: World number one Iga Swiatek reaches fourth round

articles.description: World number one Scottie Scheffler shows improvement with the putter as he prepares to defend his Players Championship title at Sawgrass this week.
articles.title: Players Championship: Scottie Scheffler finds putting form before Sawgrass defence

articles.description: Malaysia says it has been offered £100m to support the hosting of the 2026 Commonwealth Games.
articles.title: Commonwealth Games: Malaysia says it has been offered £100m to help stage 2026 event
